synopsis.text:
Gadget enthusiasts and time-travel connoisseurs reunite in this special episode of Steins;Gate, set a few months after the series finale. The Future Gadget Laboratory crew, led by the eccentric Rintarou Okabe, embarks on an exciting journey to Los Angeles, invited by their friend Faris. The purpose? To reunite with their old colleague Kurisu Makise, who has been working in an American lab since the dramatic events in Japan.

As Okabe's mad scientist alter-ego, Hououin Kyouma, attracts unwanted attention from the local police, the group faces unexpected challenges on their American vacation. Stranded in a rundown motel and dealing with Okabe's antics, they remain determined to discuss world lines and Kurisu's mysterious, fragmented memories of events from other timelines.

As the reunion with Kurisu approaches, Okabe must confront the enigmatic scientist, who questions him about the reality of their shared past experiences. Will they find the answers they seek, or will this encounter lead them down a path of chaos and confusion? Join our heroes as they navigate the complexities of time, memory, and friendship in this thrilling continuation of the Steins;Gate saga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
